long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any audio on your browser into real-time captions and translations across 35+ languages. Whether you're watching videos, participating in online meetings, or listening to podcasts, this extension provides instant, accurate transcriptions and translations right in your browser.

Key Features:

🎯 Real-time transcription of live audio from any browser tab.
🌐 Instant translation into more than 40 languages.
💫 Floating caption window that can be positioned anywhere on your screen.
🎤 Support for both recorded and live audio sources.
✨ High accuracy powered by ChatGPT's advanced speech recognition technology.

Setup & Requirements:

⚙️ Quick one-time setup requiring your OpenAI API key.
💰 No hidden costs - you only pay for what you use through your own account.
💻 Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Perfect for:

📚 Students watching educational content.
🤝 Professionals in international meetings.
🗣️ Language learners.
🎥 Content creators requiring transcripts.
👥 Anyone needing real-time captions or translations.

Privacy & Security:

🔒 Your OpenAI API key is stored locally and securely.
🚫 No data is collected or stored by the extension.
🛡️ All processing happens through your personal OpenAI account.
⚡ Complete control over when transcription is active.

Get started with real-time transcription and translation today!
